name: gangliocytoma
definition: A central nervous system benign neoplasm that has_material_basis_in mature neurons, and is classified by the absence of neoplastic glial cells. [url:https\://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007/978-1-4419-1062-2_18, url:https\://radiopaedia.org/articles/gangliocytoma, url:https\://rarediseases.info.nih.gov/diseases/10638/gangliocytoma]

clinicalTrials.title: Pediatric Long-Term Follow-up and Rollover Study
